label: Plumari, Massimo & Peter Mašán.  2014. Loricaseius lepontinus gen. nov., sp. nov., a new genus and species of eviphidid mite from the Italian Alps (Acari: Mesostigmata), with an updated key to European genera of the family Eviphididae. Zootaxa 3802(1): 10–22.
